author: striker
msg: Restore what was lost in rev 6908.
* tools/client-side/bash_completion
* tools/client-side/bash_completion_test
* tools/client-side/server-vsn.py
* tools/client-side/showchange.pl
Revived.

author: striker
msg: Allow mailer.py to handle multiple groups that match in the configuration.
This is useful for situations where you always want commit mail for any
commit in a repository, while someone else may only be interested in a
single subdirectiory of the same repository.  Previously, only the first
matching group would be selected.
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.py
(main): Replace the call to which_group to which_groups.  Handle
the return of multiple groups.
(Config.which_groups): Renamed from which_group.  Return a list of
all groups that match, instead of a single, first matching, group.

author: epg
msg: CPPFLAGS often contains some necessary settings, and without it
building the bindings can fail.  This happens, for example, on NetBSD
when python is using GNU pth.
* Makefile.in:
Add $(CPPFLAGS) to COMPILE_PY_WRAPPER and COMPILE_PL_WRAPPER.

author: kfogel
msg: Shorten some test description strings.  Now none are longer than 50
characters, so we don't trigger the warning added in revision 6666.
* tools/cvs2svn/run-tests.py
(bogus_tag, ctrl_char_in_log, interleaved_commits, split_branch):
Remove support for Prolix IV and descendant OS's.

author: kfogel
msg: Simplify code by using more of Python:
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py
(CollectData.get_branch_name, CollectData.get_tags,
CollectData.get_branches): Just use the get() method, instead of
writing it out by hand.
